phrs.translation: 误传, 告诉错误的消息, 告诉

sentences.sentence: Don't misinform your doctor or your lawyer.
sentences.translation: 不要向医生和律师提供错误的信息。

sentences.sentence: You can misinform this generation, but his genius lives on!
sentences.translation: 你也许误会了这个年代，但他的天才永生！

sentences.sentence: Viruses will cause much confusion. Even some virus "experts" will misinform the cause of the virus.
sentences.translation: 病毒是导致很多问题产生的一个原因，甚至有些专家也会对病毒的产生产生误解。
